---

title: My followers
sidebar_label: My followers
description: /public/futures/user/v1/public/copy-trade/leader-follower-page
---

## 接口

**GET** `/public/futures/user/v1/public/copy-trade/leader-follower-page`

## 请求参数

| 名称              | 类型   | 必填 | 默认值 | 说明              | 范围      |
| ----------------- | ------ | ---- | ------ | ----------------- | --------- |
| `leaderAccountId` | number | 是   |        | leader account id |           |
| `id`              | number | 否   |        | page id           |           |
| `direction`       | String | 是   | NEXT   | page direction    | NEXT/PREV |
| `limit`           | number | 是   | 10     | page size         |           |

## 示例请求

### Java

```java
public String myFollowersGet(){


}
```

## 响应示例

### Response

```json
{
  "rc": 0,
  "mc": "string",
  "ma": [{}],
  "result": {
    "hasPrev": false, //prev
    "hasNext": false, //next
    "items": [
      {
        "accountId": 0,
        "avatar": "",
        "days": 0,
        "followMarginU": 0,
        "followProfitRate": 0,
        "followProfitU": 0,
        "followerName": "",
        "id": 0
      }
    ]
  }
}
```
